plot outline: Rahul is an executive who lives with his parents in Malaysia. He finds love in Sarika (Avantika Salian) who has been deputed for 4 months in his office. After a few months Rahul gets promoted and is given the option of moving to US or India. To appease his mother, he chooses to move to USA but an incident takes Rahul back to India in search of his biological mother, Rahul wants to know why she deserted him. Will Rahul find his mother? How will his foster parents react to this situation and what will happen when he learns the truth about his roots?
title: Saad
plot: Rahul is an executive who lives with his parents in Malaysia. He finds love in Sarika (Avantika Salian) who has been deputed for 4 months in his office. After a few months Rahul gets promoted and is given the option of moving to US or India. To appease his mother, he chooses to move to USA but an incident takes Rahul back to India in search of his biological mother, Rahul wants to know why she deserted him. Will Rahul find his mother? How will his foster parents react to this situation and what will happen when he learns the truth about his roots?::Shrinivas G. Kulkarni
